name: Pizza Tower Discount Version (Demo 2)
description:
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/PizzaTowerDiscount/799619

Credits to the guy who made pizza tower

Controls:

Click button or press enter to start

z to jump

arrow keys to move

c to taunt

x to lunge right to kill

s to lunge left to kill

x and up arrow to jump high

up arrow to change clothes at "closet thing" and and to go in door
